title: 'World Is Coming To India': PM Modi Welcomes Delegates To The AI-India Impact Summit 2026
description: The India AI Impact Expo 2026 will be held from February 16 to 20 alongside the India AI Impact Summit and is envisioned as a national showcase of artificial intelligence in action, bringing together policy, innovation, and large-scale implementation under one platform.
content:
New Delhi: The tech leaders of the World are in India today as the medga AI-India Impact summit gets underway in the capital. The AI India Expo will be inaugurated later in the day by Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
The Prime Minister on Monday welcome... [3027 chars]

title: Hollywood groups condemn ByteDance's AI video generator, claiming copyright infringement
description: A new artificial intelligence video generator from Beijing-based ByteDance, the creator of TikTok, is drawing the ire of Hollywood organizations that say Seedance 2.0 “blatantly” violates copyright and uses the likeness of actors and others without permission.
content: A new artificial intelligence video generator from Beijing-based ByteDance, the creator of TikTok, is drawing the ire of Hollywood organizations that say Seedance 2.0 “blatantly” violates copyright and uses the likeness of actors and others without p... [1809 chars]

title: University of Michigan student accused of using AI suing school; lawsuit alleges disability discrimination
description: University of Michigan regents and faculty engaged in disability discrimination against a student accused by an instructor of using artificial intelligence to write papers, according to a lawsuit filed in federal court.
content:
A federal lawsuit alleges University of Michigan regents and faculty engaged in disability discrimination against a student accused by an instructor of using artificial intelligence to write papers.
The court document was filed with the U.S. District... [3651 chars]

title: India hosts AI summit as safety concerns grow
description: NEW DELHI, India — A global artificial intelligence summit kicks off in New Delhi on Monday with big issues on the agenda, from job disruption to child safety, but some attendees warn the broad focus could diminish the chance of concrete commitments from world leaders.
content: NEW DELHI, India — A global artificial intelligence summit kicks off in New Delhi on Monday with big issues on the agenda, from job disruption to child safety, but some attendees warn the broad focus could diminish the chance of concrete commitments ... [4039 chars]

description: India kicks off one of the world's largest artificial intelligence summits Monday, with Prime Minister Narendra Modi seeking to clear a path for India in a heated race to develop frontier models.

title: Bill Gates to visit Andhra on Monday, hold discussions with CM Naidu on health, AI
description: Microsoft founder Bill Gates is set to visit Andhra Pradesh on Monday to discuss expanding cooperation in health and artificial intelligence initiatives with Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu. Gates will also observe the state's Real Time Governance System and witness the use of drones and AI in agriculture.
content:
